page-editor_no_write_permissions: You have not enough permission to edit this page
create-form_info: Page will be created under /docs unless an absolute path is given. The page name must not contain '..' or be empty.
move-form_info: Page will be created under /docs unless an absolute path is given. The page name must not contain '..' or be empty.
general-information_welcome: Welcome to Smeagol, the repository documentation wiki.
general-information_description: Below you see a list of all Git repositories on your repository server that you have access to. If you want to write documentation for a repository you simply have to add a .smeagol.yml file to the root of the repository. Once that is done you can use the wiki. Whenever you save changes to a wiki Smeagol pushes them to the repository. This way the documentation is always up-to-date and where it belongs - close to the code!.
